# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of our projects seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability within any of the projects in this repository, we encourage you to report it to us as quickly as possible.

### How to Report

Please report security vulnerabilities by emailing us at [elvis360@gmail.com](mailto:elvis360@gmail.com).

When reporting, please include as much detail as possible:
*   A clear and concise description of the vulnerability.
*   Steps to reproduce the vulnerability.
*   The affected project(s) and version(s).
*   Any potential impact of the vulnerability.
*   If possible, provide a proof-of-concept or exploit code.

### Our Commitment

We are committed to addressing security vulnerabilities in a timely and responsible manner. We will acknowledge your report within 2 business days and provide a more detailed response, including an estimated timeline for remediation, within 7 business days.

We appreciate your efforts to responsibly disclose your findings and will work with you to understand and resolve the issue.

Thank you for helping to keep our projects secure.
